hero.title: Organize your workflow and stop losing clients
hero.subtitle: Slow proposal, competitor wins. Create professional proposals in seconds. Contract validated in 800+ projects. PRD with tasks on schedule. All in minutes—design, apps, software. Never lose a client to delays again.

start.title: Stop missing deadlines. Stop fearing lawsuits.
start.subtitle: Contract validated in 800+ projects. You're protected. Structured PRD with tasks organized by delivery time. Your clients will respect you. You'll sleep peacefully.

about.sectionTitle: Every wasted minute is money that doesn't come in
about.sectionSubtitle: Slow proposal = lost client. No contract = lawsuit risk. No planning = delays and unhappy clients.
about.content1: While you take 3 days to prepare a proposal, your competitor already closed the deal. Create professional proposal in 5 minutes. Client receives, client approves, you get paid.
about.content2: 800+ projects without lawsuits. Lawyers created this contract. AI adapts to your client. Copyright, payment, cancellation, all covered. Brazil, USA, Europe, works anywhere.
about.title3: Never delay again. Never improvise again.
about.content3: Client complaining about delays? Scope changing constantly? It's over. PRD structured by professionals plus organized tasks, you deliver on time. Happy client. No stress for you.

quiz.step1: What's the name of your project?
quiz.step2: What are the main goals of your project?
quiz.step3: When do you need this project completed?
quiz.step4: What's your budget for this project?
quiz.billingFixedPriceDesc: Single price for the full project
quiz.payment5050Desc: Half on approval, half on final delivery
quiz.terminationNoRefund: No refund for amounts already paid
quiz.terminationYesDesc: Client may cancel without refund of amount paid
quiz.prdStepLang: In which language do you want the project?
quiz.prdStepDeadline: When do you want the project to be ready?
quiz.prdDeadlineHint: Tasks will be divided according to the timeframe set for developing this project.
quiz.prdStep0: What type of platform do you want to build?
quiz.prdStep1: Which web framework do you want to use?
quiz.prdStep2: Which framework for the native app?
quiz.featuresHint: Uncheck only the ones you don't need
quiz.projectGoalsPlaceholder: e.g. Create a user-friendly mobile app to help people track their daily water intake
quiz.projectDescriptionHint: If you do not have a proposal link, describe the main features and project details here.
quiz.projectDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g. Scope, deliverables, features, timeline, and technologies involved.
quiz.billingOtherPlaceholder: Describe how you want to charge
quiz.paymentOtherPlaceholder: Describe how you want to get paid
quiz.billingPaymentOtherPlaceholder: Describe it here if it is different
quiz.contractorDocumentPlaceholder: e.g. National ID, Tax ID, or other document
quiz.clientDocumentPlaceholder: e.g. National ID, Tax ID, or other document
quiz.platformWebDesc: Responsive web app (desktop, tablet, mobile). Ideal for fast MVP.
quiz.platformMobileDesc: Installable app (App Store, Google Play). Full performance and hardware access.
quiz.platformWebAndMobileDesc: Both platforms sharing the same backend. Maximum reach.
quiz.langPlaceholder: e.g. all in Portuguese, or UI in PT and database in EN
quiz.otherFeaturesPlaceholder: Type each feature and separate by comma
quiz.mobileFrameworkOtherPlaceholder: e.g. Xamarin, other framework or technology
quiz.designSystemNo: No, I already have my design
quiz.customRulesPlaceholder: e.g. User permissions, workflows, technical requirements...
quiz.customRulesHint: Detail your project as much as possible here. The more information, the better the generated PRD.
quiz.minCharsToContinue: Type at least 100 characters to continue.

quizGenerating.countdownMessage: Your document will be delivered in {seconds} seconds.
quizGenerating.countdownProposal: Your proposal will be delivered in {seconds} seconds.
quizGenerating.countdownContract: Your contract will be delivered in {seconds} seconds.
quizGenerating.countdownPrd: Your PRD will be delivered in {seconds} seconds.
